Name: Smokebomb
Description: You create and throw a smokebomb. All creatures in the area suffer –2 Accuracy for 4 scenes.
Lore: A cloud thick enough to turn certainty into guesswork.

Name: Flashbang
Description: You create and throw a flashbang. All creatures in the area suffer –4 Accuracy until the end of their next turn.
Lore: Light, weaponized into a single disorienting instant.

Name: Molly
Description: You create and throw an incendiary flask. Creatures in the area take 2 Fire Damage and gain the Burn condition.
Lore: Some mixtures are meant to break, not last.

Name: Combat Engineer
Description: You deploy an automated turret. The turret fires at the end of your turn, dealing 2 Damage and having 3 Durability.
Lore: Built for war, perfected by necessity.

Name: Money Bomb
Description: You create and throw a shrapnel bomb packed with coins. Creatures in the area take 4 Damage.
Lore: Greed hurts most when it hits at full speed.

Name: Time Bomb
Description: You throw an explosive that detonates after 1 round, dealing 3 Damage. If two Time Bombs occupy the same tile, they immediately detonate.
Lore: The deadliest part is knowing it’s coming.

Name: Deployable Cover
Description: You deploy a 3 Tile Wide piece of Half Cover facing a chosen direction. It has 6 Durability.
Lore: Sometimes survival is just having something solid in front of you.

Name: Dynamite!
Material:
| 1× Powder – Explosive
| 1× Rope - Cord
| 1× Cloth - Patch
Description: Creatures in the area take 5 Damage. Any non-reinforced cover in the affected tiles is destroyed.

Name: Lasso
Description: Make a ranged attack you are proficient with. On a successful hit, the target is Restrained. You may roll Competing [Might] to pull the creature up to 2 units closer to you.
Lore: Control the rope, control the fight.

Name: Flare Gun
Description: Make a ranged attack you are proficient with. Fires a bright projectile. On hit, the target takes 2 Damage and gains 2 Burn. Must be reloaded after each shot.

Name: Bola
Description: On hit, the target takes 1 Damage and gains 3 stacks of Slow.

Name: Satchel Charge
Description: You place an explosive charge. You may detonate it later as a Reaction, dealing 4 Damage in a 1-unit radius.
Lore: Set it. Forget it. Regret it.

Name: Caltrops
Description: Creatures that move through affected tiles take 1 Damage.

Name: Sonic Wave
Description: Creatures in the area suffer –2 Accuracy until the end of their next turn.

Name: Net
Description: Make a ranged attack you are proficient with. On hit, the target is Restrained.

Name: Adhesive Foam Grenade
Material:
| 1× Liquid - Oil
| 1× Glass – Tube
| 1× Powder – Conductive
Description: The target cannot move for 2 scenes but does not grant advantage to attackers.

Name: Dread Smoke
Description: Creates smoke. Creatures inside lose resistance to Intimidation effects for 4 scenes. And suffer a -4 penalty to resisting those effects.

Name: Snooze Gas
Description: Creatures must succeed a [Fortitude] Check or fall Asleep.

Name: Frag Grenade
Description: Creatures take 6 Damage and gain 6 Bleed.

Name: Fireworks
Material:
| 1× Powder – Explosive
| 1× Powder - Conductive
| 1× Cloth - Patch
Description: You launch a rocket at a creature, you are proficient with this attack, dealing 3 Damage.

Name: Rage Smoke
Material:
| 1× Glass – Tube
| 1× Liquid - Alcohol
| 1× Powder – Conductive
Description: Creatures affected gain Rage. While enraged, they must attack the nearest creature and cannot choose targets.

Name: Sticky jar
Description: The area becomes difficult terrain.

Name: Oil Jar
Description: The area becomes slippery terrain.
